post.author: 부기흡
post.content:
Hi Config team members,

As discussed in our previous meeting, we need a candidate API by tomorrow. This is not necessarily a final API as we understand so wrap up your work now and prepare for submission.

We are expecting to get the class files with:
classes, public attributes, and public methods commented so that they are ready for document generation. Any private fields and/or code implementation do not deserve out interest at this point.

Email me your source files to kihup.boo@gmail.com.

I will consolidate the works and prepare a design documentation for an external review.

Thanks in advance.
post.title: [config] milestone tomorrow (8/24) - call for api submission
